Package org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.store

Class MetastoreFileTableMetadataProvider

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.store.MetastoreFileTableMetadataProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
TableMetadataProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetastoreParquetTableMetadataProvider
public class MetastoreFileTableMetadataProvider extends Object implements TableMetadataProvider
Implementation of TableMetadataProvider which uses Drill Metastore for providing table metadata for file-based tables.
